name: get_dealers_for_market
description: FINAL STEP. Use this tool only after you have a specific market name from the 'get_available_markets' tool. It retrieves a detailed list of seed dealers, including their names and contact info, for that one market.

state.description: The full name of the state, e.g., 'Uttar Pradesh'.

district.description: The full name of the district, e.g., 'Kanpur Nagar'.

market.description: The exact name of the market, chosen from the list provided by the 'get_available_markets' tool.
